subject: Haptic sensors for pedals
description_text:
Hi,

I ordered the Simsonn Pro X Ultra Sim Racing Pedals with Haptic reactors (Order #SSN1796).  First off great pedals, love them.  I received the haptics yesterday,  and there are only two in the box.  I thought I would get a reactor for each pedal, not just gas and brake.

Thanks,
Andrew Swalheim EA

conversations.body_text: Hi Andrew Swalheim,    You only received two, correct? We will arrange to send you a complete set including the motor and the mounting bracket.
Hi yes,  I only received two haptic motors.

Hi Andrew Swalheim,  No worries — it seems our warehouse shipped the wrong item. We’ll send you the correct one tomorrow and provide the tracking number as soon as possible.       Additionally, you can go to the update interface and select "Manual Firmware Update", then navigate to the pedals-firmware folder → pedals folder, and select the proxultra.sfu file to perform a temporary update. This can help resolve the game binding issue.
